definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: ear of grain;—´[[שׁ]]: abs. Job 24:21 +; pl. [[שִׁבֳּלִים]] Ge 41:5 +, cstr. [[שִׁבֳּלֵי]] Zec 4:12;—ear, Ge 41:5, Ge 41:6, Ge 41:7, Ge 41:7, Ge 41:22, Ge 41:23, Ge 41:24, Ge 41:24, Ge 41:26, Ge 41:27, Is 17:5, Is 17:5, Ru 2:2, Job 24:24; transf. spike (Pusey), end of olive bough Zec 4:12.
